title: Syria's Ghouta residents "wait to die" as more bombs fall
text:
Syria's Ghouta residents "wait to die" as more bombs fall 6:01pm GMT - 01:48 
Residents of Syria's eastern Ghouta district said they were waiting their ''turn to die'' on Wednesday, amid one of the most intense bombardments of the war by pro-government forces on the besieged, rebel-held enclave near Damascus. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
